tool_description: Records temperature readings from multiple sensors across food service areas with timestamp and location data.

sensor_id.description: Unique identifier for the temperature sensor

location_type.description: Area type: storage, preparation, serving, transport

equipment_id.description: Equipment identifier if sensor is attached to specific equipment

error_messages: Invalid sensor_id: Sensor identifier must be a non-empty string with alphanumeric characters only.
Invalid location_type: Must be one of [storage, preparation, serving, transport].
Temperature out of range: Temperature must be between -20°F and 200°F for food service applications.
Duplicate reading: Same sensor cannot log multiple readings within 30 seconds.
usage: Provide sensor_id, location_type, and temperature_value for each reading. Optionally specify equipment_id if sensor monitors specific equipment. Tool automatically timestamps each entry.

log_id.description: Unique identifier for this temperature log entry

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when reading was recorded

status.description: Confirmation status of the logging operation
